metadata.title: CVE-2023-38583 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the LXT2lxt2_rd_expand_integer_to_bits function of GTKWave 3.3.115. A speciallycrafted .lxt2 file can lead to arbitrary code execution. A victim wouldneed to open a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
